price: (97) And say, "My Lord, I seek refuge in You from the incitements of the devils,
arabic: وَقُل رَّبِّ أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنۡ هَمَزَٰتِ ٱلشَّيَٰطِينِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waqul rabbi aʿūdhu bika min hamazāti al-shayāṭīni
